cast.name: 亚思敏·弗莱彻 Yasmeen Fletcher
艾利克斯·希伯特 Alex R. Hibbert

writer.name: 汉娜·洛根·彼得森 Hannah Logan Peterson

director.name: 汉娜·洛根·彼得森 Hannah Logan Peterson

introduction: Genevieve (Mina Sundwall) is up against an unsettling senior year as she faces the one-year mark of a tragic school shooting that took her boyfriend. What should be a time of growth, anticipation, and pride is marred with trauma and loss that feels like purgatory rather than progress. As she gets closer to graduation, decisions seem impotent. That feeling is collectively shared by her friend Ben (Alex R. Hibbert) who transferred schools, her mother (Maria Dizzia) and the school basketball coach, heartbreakingly played by John Cho.
